Here is a summry of the most user-facing known issues with the latest beta:

  # Mark as watched - the submit button is missing.
  # Some SMB Shares do not mount properly. Make sure Sharename is pingable (use IP address if it isnt)  - See http://code.google.com/p/oversight/issues/detail?id=123 
  # Public SMB Shares that do not have a username set, do not mount properly. public shares require a dummy username/password as a temporary workaround - See http://code.google.com/p/oversight/issues/detail?id=125
  # Re-installing nzbget will stop Oversight unpacking - to fix you must re-install Oversight (Click the re-install option in the admin pages)

For a full list of issues see http://code.google.com/p/oversight/issues/list
